name: Don't Learn, Repeat!
description:
Don't Learn, Repeat!

A strange platformer/adventure made by Filip Novotny (Quadratic Games) for Trijam #117.

Theme: "Don't learn from mistakes - repeat!"

I somehow misremembered it and thought that the theme is just "Don't learn - repeat", so the game is built on that theme.

Controls: WAD to move, P to restart level

Made with Godot Engine, some sounds downloaded from freesound.org.
